snippet.title: Spelunky 2 - Launch Trailer (Steam and PS4)
snippet.description:
Spelunky 2 is out now on Steam and PS4! The sequel to the critically-acclaimed roguelike platformer is here!
Buy it now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/418530/Spelunky_2/
Buy it now on PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4407-CUSA20601_00-SPELUNKY20000000

Trailer by: Derek Lieu

https://www.derek-lieu.com/

VO by: Rosie Okumura

https://twitter.com/irlrosie

Featuring illustrations by: Justin Chan

https://www.justinchan.art/

Derek Yu: http://www.twitter.com/mossmouth
BlitWorks: http://www.twitter.com/blitworks
Eirik Suhrke: http://www.twitter.com/strotchy

http://www.mossmouth.com/spelunky2/
